summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from June 1, 2016, to June 30, 2016. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and fees associated with the account. The document emphasizes the importance of reporting errors or questions regarding the account promptly.
